alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 4:56PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Lincoln. * WHEN...Until 645 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 455 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Caliente and Antelope Canyon. - This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Lincoln County between mile markers 82 and 96. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
